title: Stephen King (Bibliography 1974 - 2008) Complete collection
description:
THE MOST COMPLETE BIBLIOGRAPHY OF STEPHEN KING

I have one dream: To collect all books from Stephen King and buy all original DVD movies and put them on shelves one day. But there is two problem, i have not enough space in my room to do this, and i have not enough money either (Not even close in next several years)
Till that day when IÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll have enough money and enough space, I would be satisfied with electronic bibliography of Stephen King that I collect in last several days, and of course movies that I already watched and download (and will) from thePiratebay. 
It take a lot of my time to find all this books, and after that convert them from stupid .LITS and Microsoft Word to .PDF. So, all books are in PDF! (Except Roadwork from 1981. I didnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t succeed to convert from LIT to PDF, but still the book is readable with Microsoft Reader, SalemÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Lot from 2004 is in LIT and PDF,format, but LIT is much more readable than other one). Leave a comment if anyone manage to convert properly these books. If those books are not converted good, (I checked each one, and they are good converted) in a case if you still want to make some changes, like formatting the text and make books more tidy, so you can print, read or edit,  I recommend strongly to use Foxit not Adobe, or Solid PDF converter, only for converting.
Collection is divided by years, from 1974, and his first novel Carrie, till 2008, and last story collection Just After Sunset. Some years are empty, because King didnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t published his works that years (exactly 1975, 1997 and 2000). Collection has 64 Novels, 8 Story Collections and 104 Stories. Well, it is not because I collected it, but this is amazing collection (or bibliography) of Stephen King, as I like to say ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢A most complete collection of Stephen KingÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s books on internetÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢. ATTENTION!!! Two books I didnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t find complete, these are Blaze and Colorado Kid, they have only beginning parts (first one have first two chapters, and second one have first 50 pages) and I beg anyone who have these books to share with other members, so we can have totally complete collection. I must admit that I am very jealous on all those people who know English very well, I hope I will improve mine with Stephen King.
